## Geographically Weighted GW model


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf, ggstatsplot, spdep, tmap, tidyverse, knitr, GWmodel)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                 layer = "Hunan")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `Hunan' from data source 
  `D:\2. SMU - MITB\Term 4\ISSS626 Geospatial\YX-Leng\ISSS626-Geospatial\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex04\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 88 features and 7 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 108.7831 ymin: 24.6342 xmax: 114.2544 ymax: 30.12812
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::


::: {.callout-important appearance="simple"}
No CSR projection for this - please note that you should normally do st_transform to get the CSR projection.
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 88 Columns: 29
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (2): County, City
dbl (27): avg_wage, deposite, FAI, Gov_Rev, Gov_Exp, GDP, GDPPC, GIO, Loan, ...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_sf <- left_join(hunan,hunan2012)%>%
  select(1:3, 6, 7, 15, 16, 31, 32)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Joining with `by = join_by(County)`
```


:::
:::


::: {.callout-caution appearance="simple"}
In order to do relational join:

-   Ensure that there are common / same field names (i.e. even uppercase and lowercase **must** be the same for unique match)
:::

### Converting to SpatialPolygonDataFrame


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_sp <- hunan_sf %>%
  as_Spatial()
```
:::


### Geographically Weighted Summary Statistics with adaptive bandwidth


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_CV <- bw.gwr(GDPPC ~ 1,
                data = hunan_sp,
                approach = "CV",
                adaptive = TRUE,
                kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Adaptive bandwidth: 62 CV score: 15515442343 
Adaptive bandwidth: 46 CV score: 14937956887 
Adaptive bandwidth: 36 CV score: 14408561608 
Adaptive bandwidth: 29 CV score: 14198527496 
Adaptive bandwidth: 26 CV score: 13898800611 
Adaptive bandwidth: 22 CV score: 13662299974 
Adaptive bandwidth: 22 CV score: 13662299974 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_AIC <- bw.gwr(GDPPC ~ 1, 
                 data = hunan_sp, 
                 approach = "AIC", 
                 kernel = "bisquare", 
                 adaptive = TRUE, 
                 longlat = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 62 AICc value: 1923.156 
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 46 AICc value: 1920.469 
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 36 AICc value: 1917.324 
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 29 AICc value: 1916.661 
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 26 AICc value: 1914.897 
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 22 AICc value: 1914.045 
Adaptive bandwidth (number of nearest neighbours): 22 AICc value: 1914.045 
```


:::
:::


### Computing geographically weighted summary statistics


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwstat <- gwss(data = hunan_sp,
               vars = "GDPPC",
               bw = bw_AIC,
               kernel = "bisquare",
               adaptive = TRUE,
               longlat =T)
```
:::


### Preparing the output data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwstat_df <- as.data.frame(gwstat$SDF)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hunan_gstat <- cbind(hunan_sf, gwstat_df)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(hunan_gstat) + 
  tm_fill("GDPPC_LM",
          n = 5,
          style = "quantile") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of geographically weighted mean",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 1.0,
            legend.text.size = 1.0,
            legend.height = 1.50,
            legend.width = 1.50,
            frame = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

:::
:::
